boardgame.name: Liberty Roads
boardgame.description: Liberty Roads is a WWII campaign of France simulation, from 6th of June 1944 (the D-Day) to March 1945. The game map covers all the operation theater from Brest to the Ruhr, Rotterdam and Toulon. Rules are divided in basic rules and advanced rules. Basic rules covers movement, combat, supply... and allows play of introduction scenario Cobra. Advanced rules deals mainly with airborne drops and landings._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game length:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Cobra scenario: 1.5 to 2 hrs._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; D-Day scenario: 6 to 8 hrs._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Campaign scenario: 15 to 20 hrs._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game scale: 1 hex = 25 km_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 counter = 1 division_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Complexity : Moderate_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Ich verkaufe hier das hervorragende Strategiespiel _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Liberty Roads_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; von Hexasim. Das Spiel wurde aus beruflichen Testzwecken nur einmal gespielt und befindet sich in absolut neuwertigen Zustand. Lediglich eine Ecke des Kartons war bei Lieferung leicht beschädigt (siehe Foto). Die Komponenten wurden nach besten Wissen von mir nachgezählt und sind vollständig gewesen. Das Spiel beinhaltet verschiedene Szenarien im zweiten Weltkrieg an der Westfront. Das Spiel ist für 2 Spieler und komplett in Englisch. Neben dem sehr guten Gameplay besitzt dieses 2009 herausgekommene Spiel schon jetzt einen hohen Sammlerwert und gilt in der Szene (soweit ich weiß) als ein Juwel der strategischen Combat Simulations. Für mehr Informationen: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/39188/liberty-roads Abholung in Bornheim / NRW möglich. Alternativ biete ich für 4,69 den versicherten Versand per Hermes an. Privatverkauf, keine Garantie, keine Gewährleistung, keine Rücknahme. For EU delivery please ask for shipping costs.

*** With every sale we donate a percentage to the Veterans Support Foundation (including this sale). *** Wargame Depot has donated over $7,700 to this wonderful cause thanks, largely, to the wonderful Boardgamegeek community. Thank you so much for your continued support of Wargame Depot which has allowed us to give generously to the VSF. Mint, in shrink copy available. No dings, no dents, or anything wrong with the game. Non-smoking environment and kept in a humidity-controlled location. $12 shipping to US - write me for a quote to the rest of the world. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m the owner of Wargame Depot so a purchase from me will always be packed professionally and I can accept Paypal, MO/Check, or MC/Visa/Discover/AMEX. And if you want this game plus anything else that I am selling on BGG, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll of course be happy to add other items on in order to save you on shipping! North Carolina residents pay 7% sales tax. Cheers, Jason PS: We have many Osprey books in stock not listed on BGG. The prices are well under publisher rates; if you are interested in them, please let me know!

If You live outside the EU You don´t have to pay the German VAT (we send You the new, lower price with the confirmation). We offer only goods that we have in stock, You can also visit our onlineshop www.gamers-hq.de for more games Payment may be made by Paypal (no extra fee) or bank transfer in advance. If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email (laden@gamers-hq.de), give us a call (+49 30 79706126) or visit our homepage (www.gamers-hq.de).
